info.task: navigate backwards to partially checked checkbox
info.title: Navigate backwards to a partially checked checkbox in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the partially checked state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the partially checked state.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the checkbox (partially checked) is conveyed
